answerText: David (Robert Joseph) Beckham, OBE[10] This teammate of Beckham is captain of both the Irish national team and the Los Angeles Galaxy. This prolific goalscorer for Tottenham Hotspur in the mid-2000s scored the final goal in the 2012 MLS Cup final.
heading: Terrapin |2013 | Ike Jose + Tanay Kothari | 4 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: "Jess" Bhamra gets a soccer scholarship at the end of a movie named for this athlete. For 10 points each: [10] Name this longtime midfielder for the English national team whose wife was a member of the Spice Girls. His most recent title came with the Los Angeles Galaxy.
